title: The Cozy Cafe Barista
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), highly detailed CG illustration, 2D Anime style, 9:16 aspect ratio. A charming young male barista, short messy brown hair, friendly smile, slightly blushing cheeks, wearing a dark striped polo shirt and a clean white apron. Close-up portrait, dynamic action shot, focused view on the hands and coffee cup. He is skillfully pouring steamed milk from a metallic pitcher to create perfect heart-shaped latte art in a white ceramic mug. Gentle steam rising from the hot beverage. Cozy coffee shop interior background, warm morning sunlight streaming through a large window, wooden counter, potted green plants, soft volumetric lighting, detailed background elements.
